= List of Accessor plugins =

The following is a list of Accessor plugins that are shipped with 7plus.

 * [docsAccessorCalculator Calculator] 
 * [docsAccessorClipboard Clipboard] 
 * [docsAccessorControlPanel Control Panel] 
 * [docsAccessorEventPlugin Event Plugin] 
 * [docsAccessorFileSearch File Search] 
 * [docsAccessorFileSystem File System] 
 * [docsAccessorGoogle Google] 
 * [docsAccessorKeyword Keyword Plugin] 
 * [docsAccessorNotepadTabSwitcher Notepad++ Tab Switcher] 
 * [docsAccessorNotes Notes] 
 * [docsAccessorProgramLauncher Program Launcher] 
 * [docsAccessorRecentFolders Recent Folders] 
 * [docsAccessorRegistry Registry]

 * [docsAccessorSciTE4AutoHotkeyTabSwitcher SciTE4AutoHotkey Tab Switcher] 
 * [docsAccessorUninstall Uninstall] 
 * [docsAccessorURL URL] 
 * [docsAccessorWeather Weather] 
 * [docsAccessorWindowSwitcher Window Switcher]
